attributes.action: allow children to have a greater say in the running of the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a child I have myself being constantly rejected from: my church (communion) and changing rules in my school and country.  Yet I think that I am grown-up enough to change a darkening world.  Children should be allowed to have a say in a society where they will soon be the rulers of themselves.
